State Module¶

state_manager¶

class modbus_gui_app.state.state_manager.StateManager¶

A class used to be the intermediate between the communication, database and the graphical interface of the application. All message routing and current values of the information (state) goes through an instance of this class.

response_signal¶

Used to signal when there is a response ready to be shown within the GUI.

Type

PySide2.QtCore.Signal

periodic_update_signal¶

Used to signal when the periodic update is done refreshing the current information and that information is ready to be shown in the GUI.

Type

PySide2.QtCore.Signal

connection_info_signal¶

Used to signal that the connection has a new message being sent or received.

Type

PySide2.QtCore.Signal

invalid_connection_signal¶

Used to signal that no connection was successfully established.

last_ten_dicts¶

A dictionary used to fetch and save the values from the database (ten at a time).

Type

dict

database¶

An instance of the Backend class that provides the connection to the database and the supporting functions for interacting with said database.

Type

database.db_handler.Backend

gui_request_queue¶

A queue through which the GUI sends the request data which is forwarded to the connection module.

Type

queue.Queue

modbus_connection¶

An instance of the connection class that provides the methods needed to send and receive data.

Type

communication.modbus_connection.ModbusConnection

user_action_state¶

A dictionary that stores the current request data and, when received, the corresponding response data.

Type

dict

gui¶

An instance of the graphical user interface class.

Type

gui.window.Gui

live_update_states¶

A dictionary that contains the information about the last valid requests and valid responses for every type of a request. Used to resend those requests periodically.

Type

dict

ws_read_loop_future¶

The future of the web socket reader. Publicly exposed to that it can be closed when the application is closing. By closing this read loop, other read loops also stop.

Type

asyncio.Future

logger¶

An error logger used to record any errors that might occur during the program execution.

Type

logging.logger

get_historian_db_dicts()¶

A method that reads from the database and saves the results into a dictionary.

Returns

A dictionary containing the read data and data read before that.

Return type

dict

reset_db_dict()¶

A method used to reset the data that was read from the databse and is currently stored in a dictionary.
